name: Gregory Traveler 40
pros: Comfortable carry system with padded straps and back panel
Good organization with multiple compartments and pockets
Clamshell opening for easy packing and access
Durable materials and construction typical of Gregory packs
Often meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines
cons: Slightly heavy for its size compared to some competitors
Design is less sleek or modern than some premium alternatives
Side water bottle pockets might be tight when the main compartment is fully packed
